author: curtis
description: StarRupture dedicated server (Windows) on Linux via Wine/Proton. Installs with SteamCMD (AppID 3809400) and starts with xvfb-run + wine. Ports: Game 7777 (UDP+TCP), Query 27015 (UDP).
startup: cd /home/container || exit 1; echo "Starting StarRupture..."; export WINEDEBUG=-all; SERVER_EXEC=""; for p in "./StarRupture/Binaries/Win64/StarRuptureServerEOS-Win64-Shipping.exe" "./StarRupture/Binaries/Win64/StarRuptureServerEOS.exe" "./StarRuptureServerEOS.exe"; do [ -f "$p" ] && SERVER_EXEC="$p" && break; done; if [ -z "$SERVER_EXEC" ]; then SERVER_EXEC="$(find . -maxdepth 8 -type f \( -iname '*StarRuptureServerEOS*.exe' -o -iname '*Shipping.exe' \) 2>/dev/null | head -n 1)"; fi; if [ -z "$SERVER_EXEC" ]; then echo "ERROR: StarRupture server executable not found in /home/container"; echo "Top-level listing:"; ls -la; exit 1; fi; echo "Found server exec: $SERVER_EXEC"; CMD="xvfb-run --auto-servernum wine \"$SERVER_EXEC\" -Log -Port={{SERVER_PORT}} -QueryPort={{QUERY_PORT}} -ServerName=\"{{SERVER_NAME}}\""; [ -n "${MULTIHOME}" ] && CMD="$CMD -MULTIHOME=${MULTIHOME}"; [ -n "${MAX_PLAYERS}" ] && CMD="$CMD -MaxPlayers=${MAX_PLAYERS}"; [ -n "${ADDITIONAL_ARGS}" ] && CMD="$CMD ${ADDITIONAL_ARGS}"; echo "Command: $CMD"; eval "$CMD"

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -e

APPID="3809400"
SR_DIR="/mnt/server"

# Optional deps for fallback path
if command -v apt-get >/dev/null 2>&1; then
  apt-get update -y || true
  # wine/xvfb are usually already present in proton image, but make sure unzip/xvfb exist
  apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends unzip xvfb xauth ca-certificates curl || true
  rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* || true
fi

# Steam credentials (optional)
if [[ -n "${STEAM_USER}" && -n "${STEAM_PASS}" ]]; then
  echo "Using Steam user: ${STEAM_USER}"
else
  echo "steam user is not set or incomplete. Using anonymous user."
  STEAM_USER="anonymous"
  STEAM_PASS=""
  STEAM_AUTH=""
fi

mkdir -p "${SR_DIR}/steamcmd" "${SR_DIR}/steamapps"

echo "==[1/2] Try Linux SteamCMD forcing Windows (64-bit)=="
cd /tmp
curl -sSL -o steamcmd_linux.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
rm -rf "${SR_DIR}/steamcmd"/* || true
tar -xzf steamcmd_linux.tar.gz -C "${SR_DIR}/steamcmd"
cd "${SR_DIR}/steamcmd"

export HOME="${SR_DIR}"

set +e
./steamcmd.sh \
  +@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows \
  +@sSteamCmdForcePlatformBitness 64 \
  +force_install_dir "${SR_DIR}" \
  +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} ${STEAM_AUTH} \
  +app_update ${APPID} validate \
  +quit
LINUX_RC=$?
set -e

if [ "${LINUX_RC}" -eq 0 ]; then
  echo "Linux SteamCMD install OK."
else
  echo "Linux SteamCMD failed (rc=${LINUX_RC}). Fallback to Windows SteamCMD via Wine..."

  echo "==[2/2] Windows SteamCMD under Wine (xvfb)=="
  cd /tmp
  curl -sSL -o steamcmd.zip https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd.zip
  mkdir -p "${SR_DIR}/steamcmd_win"
  rm -rf "${SR_DIR}/steamcmd_win"/* || true
  unzip -oq steamcmd.zip -d "${SR_DIR}/steamcmd_win"

  cd "${SR_DIR}/steamcmd_win"

  # IMPORTANT: map the install dir for wine as Z:\mnt\server
  export WINEDEBUG=-all
  xvfb-run --auto-servernum wine steamcmd.exe \
    +@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows \
    +force_install_dir "Z:\\mnt\\server" \
    +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} ${STEAM_AUTH} \
    +app_update ${APPID} validate \
    +quit
fi

# Create common directories (not mandatory but nice)
mkdir -p "${SR_DIR}/Saved/Logs" "${SR_DIR}/Saved/Config/WindowsServer" "${SR_DIR}/Saved/SaveGames" || true

echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Installation completed..."
echo "-----------------------------------------"

variables.description: Query port (-QueryPort). Needs UDP open. Add a SECOND allocation if you want 27015 different from the main port.

variables.name: Max Players
variables.description: Optional (-MaxPlayers=#). Leave blank if you don't want to set it.

variables.name: MultiHome
variables.description: Optional: bind to a specific IP (-MULTIHOME=IP). Leave empty to not use it.

variables.name: Additional Args
variables.description: Extra server args appended to the command line (optional).

variables.name: Steam Username (optional)
variables.description: Only set if anonymous fails for your AppID. Otherwise leave empty.

variables.name: Steam Password (optional)
variables.description: Only set if you also set Steam Username. Otherwise leave empty.

variables.name: Steam 2FA Code (optional)
variables.description: Steam Guard code if needed (usually not used).
